name: AdvanceDirectiveArtifactLOINC
title: Advance Directive Artifact (LOINC)
description: This value set contains LOINC concepts for advance directive "artifacts", i.e., electronic version document or form detailing a patients' end of life wishes.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains LOINC concepts for advance directives.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify people who have created an advance directive.  This element may map to "Communication" Category of the Quality Data Model.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes documentation of advance directive wishes, and orders for documentation of advance directive wishes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Excludes procedures related to obtaining an advanced directive, such a counseling and referrals.)
